sprint_goal: Establish the foundational multi-tenant architecture, core security posture, and CI/CD pipeline to enable parallel development.
Implement the complete user invitation and registration lifecycle, including security checks for login and password complexity.
Build out core admin user management features (deactivation, hierarchy validation) and establish operational infrastructure (indexes, monitoring, backups).
Implement key backend business logic for approvals, notifications, and automated workflows, and begin the tenant offboarding feature.
Tackle complex features: implement the Google OAuth flow, build the approval escalation engine, and complete the critical tenant data purge function.
Deliver the Google Sheets data export functionality and implement the complex data anonymization process for compliance.
